Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus <> VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) THEN CASE WHEN TimeScheduleFact.Order IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.Order IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(TimeScheduleFact.Completed, 0) = 0 AND ISNULL(TimeSchedulePlan.Completed, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.JobOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish < &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind <> VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.JobOrder) AND Not TimeScheduleFact.Order IS NULL AND TimeScheduleFact.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.JobOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Start <= &CurrentDateSession AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish >= &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind <> VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.JobOrder) AND Not TimeScheduleFact.Order IS NULL AND TimeScheduleFact.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.JobOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish < &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind <> VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.JobOrder) AND Not TimeScheduleFact.Order IS NULL AND TimeScheduleFact.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.JobOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Start <= &CurrentDateSession AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish >= &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind <> VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.JobOrder) AND Not TimeScheduleFact.Order IS NULL AND TimeScheduleFact.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END END ELSE 2 END AS ShipmentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted THEN CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <> 0) AND ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END WHEN ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <= ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END ELSE 2 END AS PaymentPictureNumber, DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref, DocumentCustomerOrder.Number, DocumentCustomerOrder.Date, DocumentCustomerOrder.Author, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentCustomerOrder.ShipmentDate, DocumentCustomerOrder.Contract, DocumentCustomerOrder.Comment, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty, DocumentCustomerOrder.Company, DocumentCustomerOrder.Responsible, DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState, CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentCustomerOrder.Start, DocumentCustomerOrder.SalesStructuralUnit, DocumentCustomerOrder.StructuralUnitReserve, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish, DocumentCustomerOrder.Cell, CASE WHEN TimeScheduleFact.Order IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.Order IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ForShipment, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) AS ForPayment, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount > 0 THEN CAST((ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0)) * 100 / DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount AS NUMBER(15, 2)) ELSE 0 END AS PaymentPercentage, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) AS Paid, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson FROM AccumulationRegister.CustomerOrders.BalanceAndTurnovers( , , Auto, , CustomerOrder.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.OrderForSale) AND (ProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType = VALUE(Enum.ProductsAndServicesTypes.InventoryItem) OR ProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType = VALUE(Enum.ProductsAndServicesTypes.Service))) AS CustomerOrdersBalanceAndTurnovers LEFT JOIN Document.CustomerOrder AS DocumentCustomerOrder ON CustomerOrdersBalanceAndTurnovers.CustomerOrder = DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS RunSchedule ON (DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = RunSchedule.Order) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS TimeScheduleFact ON (DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = TimeScheduleFact.Order) AND (TimeScheduleFact.Period <= &CurrentDateSession) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS TimeSchedulePlan ON (DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = TimeSchedulePlan.Order) AND (TimeSchedulePlan.Period > &CurrentDateSession) {LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentSchedule AS PaymentSchedule ON (DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment) AND (PaymentSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession)} LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentFact AS PaymentEvent ON (DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = PaymentEvent.InvoiceForPayment) WHERE (NOT RunSchedule.Order IS NULL OR DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref IN (&OrdersList)) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.OrderForSale)
